summary: 1998 FOUR WINDS MOTORHOME CAB SEPARATION.  MY MOTORHOME APPEARS TO HAVE A DESIGN OR MANUFACTURING FLAW.  THE MOUNTING SCREWS/BOLTS THAT CONNECT THE CAB OF THE VAN TO THE MOTORHOME COACH  HAVE FAILED.  ALL FASTENERS HAVE CRACKED OR HAVE BROKEN OUT DUE TO HOW THEY WERE DESIGNED.  MANUFACTURE CALLS THIS CAB SEPARATION.  SUGGEST THAT MINE IS NOT THE ONLY ONE WITH THIS PROBLEM, IT IS A HIDDEN PROBLEM UNTIL THE SEPARATION IS EXTREME.  I FOUND THIS IN APRIL OF THIS YEAR WHEN I TRIED TO FIND A NOISE IN THE CAB.   *NLM
